publications.name: TileClipper: Lightweight Selection of Regions of Interest from Videos for Traffic Surveillance
publications.summary: This paper presents TileClipper, a method for efficient selection of regions of interest in traffic surveillance videos, improving processing speed and resource utilization.

publications.name: Don't Forget the User: It's Time to Rethink Network Measurements
publications.summary: This work argues for incorporating user feedback, both implicit and explicit, into network measurements to complement traditional methods and expand coverage, analyzing scenarios from MS Teams and SpaceX Starlink.

publications.name: T3P: Demystifying Low-Earth Orbit Satellite Broadband
publications.summary: This paper explores and explains the complexities of Low-Earth Orbit satellite broadband technology, aiming to make it more understandable.

publications.name: On viewing SpaceX Starlink through the Social Media Lens
publications.summary: This study examines SpaceX Starlink from a social media perspective, potentially analyzing public perception, user experiences, or impact discussions on social platforms.

publications.name: Peacify: A Prototype for accessible Mental Well-Being Support
publications.summary: This paper introduces Peacify, a prototype designed to improve access to mental health resources by addressing barriers such as social pressure, language, and privacy, using a user-centered design approach.

publications.name: VISTA: Fast and Efficient Traffic Surveillance by Tile Sampling [Patent Accepted]
publications.summary: This patent describes VISTA, a method for fast and efficient traffic surveillance using tile sampling, likely improving processing speed and efficiency in video analysis for traffic monitoring.
